text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Even among the sakura cherry trees there are a lot of different kinds.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: You have Yoshino, "Weeping", "Japanese", Formosan, and a lot more cherry varieties.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Baku's always moving forward, so she's like a Formosan. Little Chiyo has the perseverance of the "Japanese" cherry. While they're all Sakuras, the flowers that bloom are different.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Hehe. I wonder what kind of flowers will bloom from me. â€¦ What do you think, Trainer?
